data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Norrbom, Allen L., Savaris, Marcoandre, Marinoni, Luciane (2016): New species of Rhagoletotrypeta (Diptera: Tephritidae) from the Dominican Republic and southern Brazil and ParaGuay. Zootaxa 4088 (4): 547-554, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4088.4.5
